author: Slidebean
description:
Ex-Meta team launches AI smart ring the next wave of wearable data.

A new startup from former Meta employees is betting on a screenless future with an AI powered smart ring that handles voice notes, music, and digital assistants.
It’s part of a broader trend: integrating AI deeper into daily life while collecting evermore personal data.
The question is no longer can tech get closer to us, it’s how close is too close?

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: The AI smart ring nobody asked for

author: Slidebean
description:
Elon Musk wants a $1 trillion paycheck for building robot armies.

Elon Musk is fighting shareholders over a $1 trillion Tesla compensation plan; Yes, trillion.
Norwegian funds and other investors are pushing back, arguing it’s excessive.
But Elon says he needs it to fund Tesla’s next big leap: AI and humanoid robots.
The irony? Most of Tesla’s current valuation isn’t from cars, it’s from promises of robots that don’t exist yet.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: Elon wants $1 trillion. Shareholders aren’t having it
